Title: A flat projective variety with d8-holonomy
Abstract: © 2019 by the Tohoku University.We show explicitly that the compact flat Kahler manifold of complex dimension three with holonomy studied by Dekimpe, Halenda and Szczepanski ([5] p. 367) possesses the structure of a nonsingular projective variety. This corrects a previous statement by H. Lange in [9] that the holonomy group of a hyperelliptic threefold is necessarily abelian.
